channel.title: Help with colour changing
channel.description:
hi i need help with a few things
1.how do i change the colour of my stats where it says like 135/135 2.how do i change the bit on the prayer menu where it says prayer lv:18/18 and lastly how do i change the colour of where it says what weapon your using and the attack style [br][size=1]Posted at: November 20, 2006, 12:22:06 PM[/size][hr]13 views and 0 replys -.-
